name: Chapter Outline
_source: #Lupus learns of a party being held by one of the Senators of Pelopos.
#Asks Simon to help break into the vault, since it'll let Lupus settle his outstanding debt
#Anuki overhears, and volunteers to join them
#During the party itself Simon must gather the three secret passwords to open the magical vault
#Once inside the vault, the three of them must solve a series of puzzles to reach the treasure
#Once they reach the treasure they silently slip out
